headline: Assessing Nordson (NDSN) Valuation After Strong Q1 Beat And Raised Full Year Guidance
summary: Nordson (NDSN) is back in focus after reporting first quarter fiscal 2026 results that exceeded expectations, paired with higher full year sales and earnings guidance that indicates stronger order trends and profit margins. See our latest analysis for Nordson. The strong first quarter update has come alongside a clear pickup in momentum, with a 30 day share price return of 10.07% and a 90 day share price return of 31.22%.
